Name: Hamster Cage Pass
Desc: A precious item used by Agents to upgrade their advanced skills.
Desc2: A delicate ring that contains a disposable access chip, which allows its wearer to access the Hamster Cage, a top-notch simulation training center. The Hamster Cage provides the most extensive and professional combat training, on par with the best-equipped training area in the Hollow Investigative Association.
